se.sensiblethings.disseminationslayer.communication.security.configuration

Class SecurityConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.sensiblethings.disseminationslayer.communication.security.configuration.SecurityConfiguration

  • public class SecurityConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    SecurityConfiguration.java This class read the XML format configuration file, and refresh the context with 5s. It provides parameters that this system needed, corresponding the specified security level
    Author:
    Hao

      Constructor and Description
      SecurityConfiguration(java.lang.String filePath, int securityLevel)
      Load the configuration file, and set the reloading strategy to refresh the context in every certain time;

      • SecurityConfiguration

        public SecurityConfiguration(java.lang.String filePath,
                     int securityLevel)
        Load the configuration file, and set the reloading strategy to refresh the context in every certain time;
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path of the configuration file
        securityLevel - The security level that should be initially specified
